title: Serial Ep. 7: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate’s David Haglund, Katy Waldman and Amanda Hess discuss The Opposite of the Prosecution, the seventh episode of Serial from This American Life. Plus: Dahlia Lithwick of Amicus explains two aspects. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be listened to after you’ve listened to the episode.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
